mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memb_id, memb_email, memb_password, memb_nickname, memb_name, memb_gender, memb_birth_date, memb_phone_number, memb_profile_img, memb_role) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{phoneNumber}, #{profileImg}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT memb_id as memberId, memb_email as email, memb_password as password, memb_nickname as nickname, memb_name as name, memb_gender as gender, memb_birth_date as birthDate, memb_phone_number as phoneNumber, memb_profile_img as profileImg, memb_create_date as createDate, memb_update_date as updateDate, memb_role as role FROM member WHERE memb_email=#{email}
